sources.title: Hooky Spooky (1957)
sources.description: On their way to Night School, Casper the Friendly Ghost and his pal, Spooky Ghost, pass a zoo, and Spooky has a good time scaring the animals until Casper, posing as the ghost of the scared denizens of the zoo, scares Spooky. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hooky-spooky-1957/

metadata.Plot: On their way to Night School, Casper the Friendly Ghost and his pal, Spooky Ghost, pass a zoo. Spooky has a good time scaring the animals until Casper, posing as the ghost of the scared denizens of the zoo, scares Spooky.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Cecil Roy
